content.1: In that day shall this song be sung in the land of Judah; We have a strong city; salvation will
content.2: Open ye the gates, that the righteous nation which keepeth the truth may enter in.
content.5: For he bringeth down them that dwell on high; the lofty city, he layeth it low; he layeth it low,
content.6: The foot shall tread it down,
content.8: Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O
content.9: With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early: for when thy judgments
content.10: Let favour be shewed to the wicked,
content.15: Thou hast increased the nation, O
content.17: Like as a woman with child,
content.18: We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.
content.20: Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast.
